content.subtitle: About the Job
content.description:
We are looking for a creative UI Designer to join our team. As a UI Designer, you will be responsible for crafting beautiful and intuitive interfaces for our products. You will work closely with our development and product teams to bring ideas to life.

You should be passionate about user experience and design, with a keen eye for detail.

list: Design user interfaces for web and mobile applications.
Collaborate with product managers and developers to create intuitive, user-friendly software.
Develop wireframes, mockups, and prototypes to communicate design ideas.
Ensure consistency of design across various digital platforms.
Stay up to date with design trends and best practices.
Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design, UI/UX Design, or a related field.
Proven experience as a UI Designer or similar role.
Proficient in design software like Adobe XD, Sketch, or Figma.
Strong understanding of UX principles and user-centered design.
Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.

content.subtitle: About the Job
content.description: We are seeking a knowledgeable and experienced Marketing Analytics who is a great SEO/Google analytics Expert to optimize our online presence and enhance search engine visibility. The ideal candidate will possess expertise in managing web optimization strategies, staying updated with search engine algorithms, and leveraging various SEO tools to drive organic traffic and improve rankings.

list: Manage and optimize website content to ensure it meets Google's Webmaster guidelines and best practices.
Conduct comprehensive keyword research to identify opportunities and optimize content accordingly.
Develop and execute comprehensive SEO strategies to improve organic search rankings and drive qualified traffic.
Implement on-page and off-page SEO strategies to enhance website performance and visibility on search engines.
Optimize website content, meta tags, headers, and URLs for target keywords.
Conduct technical SEO audits and identify areas for improvement.
Collaborate with web developers to ensure SEO best practices are implemented on the website.
Monitor and resolve issues related to website indexing, crawlability, and site speed.
Work closely with content creators to develop SEO-optimized content.
Provide guidelines and recommendations for content optimization.
Ensure content is aligned with SEO strategies and objectives.
Develop and execute effective link-building strategies.
Identify and engage with relevant industry influencers and websites for backlink opportunities.
Monitor and analyze backlink profiles to ensure quality and relevance.
Monitor and analyze website performance using tools such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush, and other relevant SEO software.
Analyze competitors and industry trends to inform SEO strategy.
Generate regular reports on website performance, traffic metrics, and SEO insights to drive continuous improvement.
Troubleshoot SEO issues, identify areas for improvement, and implement corrective measures.
Stay updated with industry trends, search engine algorithms, and best practices to adapt strategies accordingly.
Continuously test and refine SEO strategies based on industry developments.
Communicate effectively with stakeholders, including clients, project managers, and team members, to ensure project requirements are met.

content.subtitle: About the job
content.description: We are searching for a talented social media Assistant to represent our company by building a social media presence for our brands. The social media Assistant will be required to run advertising campaigns and drive engagement by creating high-quality original content. You should also engage influencers, manage our community by responding to comments, and oversee our customer service across all platforms.

list: Excellent knowledge of branding and promotional activities for all leading social media platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, etc.
Assist with the planning of marketing strategies to help drive traffic and engagement to the website.
Design and deliver creative and engaging social media posts and strategies.
Develop original content for our various products, occasion-based campaigns, customer engagement campaigns, and property.
Form key relationships with influencers across social media platforms for collaboration.
Identify the latest trends and technologies to improve digital marketing performance.
Create branded content regularly for propagating brand vision and purpose.
Engage with social media users and respond to any mentions over Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, Pinterest, etc.
Run paid ads on social media platforms to target the audience.
Create a social media calendar for 30 days and schedule accordingly.
Create reels on trending audio (4-6 reels in a month).
Proven experience in social media marketing, particularly in post-scheduling and creative curation.
Exceptional organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.
Creative mindset with the ability to generate innovative ideas for engaging social media content.
Proficiency in using social media management tools and analytics platforms.
Knowledge of videography and video editing is a plus.
Familiarity with SEO and digital marketing concepts.
BA/BS degree in marketing or a related field.
Familiarity with online marketing channels.
Up to date with the latest digital technologies and social media trends, with a command of each network and their best practices.
Creative thinker.
Excellent communication skills.
Knowledge of Adobe Photoshop/Canva is a bonus.
